rule: If a man turns into a lion: Losses.
interpretation: losses

rule: If it grows out of his lap: Whatever he owns will be lost.

rule: If a man walks repeatedly through "heavy" water: He will experience either a difficult lawsuit or a dangerous disease.

rule: If one gives him a scoop: The sesame will prosper.

rule: If one gives him an empty goblet: The poor will become poorer.
omen: one gives him an empty goblet
interpretation: the poor will become poorer

rule: If one gives him honey: There will be cases of death in his family.
interpretation: there will be cases of death in his family

rule: If one gives him mountain-honey: He will obtain his heart's desire.
interpretation: he will obtain his hearts desire

rule: If one gives him oil: Sweet words, friendliness.
interpretation: sweet words friendliness

rule: If one gives him scented oil: The same as above.
interpretation: the same as above

rule: If one gives him beef oil: Profits are in store for him.
interpretation: profits are in store for him

rule: If one gives him mutton oil: Prosperity of his term of office.
interpretation: prosperity of his term of office

rule: If one gives him bird oil: They will shout: "Watch out, watch out!"
interpretation: they will shout watch out watch out

rule: If one gives him fish oil: There will be steady expenses for him.
interpretation: there will be steady expenses for him

rule: If one gives him lion oil: He will reach perfection.
interpretation: he will reach perfection

rule: If one gives him wolf oil: An attack of the silitu-disease.
interpretation: an attack of the silitudisease

rule: If one gives him dog oil: He will be imprisoned.
interpretation: he will be imprisoned

rule: If one gives him donkey oil: He will be happy (lit.: shine).
interpretation: he will be happy lit shine

rule: If one gives him horse oil: God and king will catch him.
interpretation: god and king will catch him

rule: If one gives him mule oil: His name will not prosper.
interpretation: his name will not prosper

rule: If one gives him wild donkey oil: He will die outside of the city.
omen: one gives him wild donkey oil
interpretation: he will die outside of the city

rule: If one gives him stag oil: The bed will seize him for one year.
interpretation: the bed will seize him for one year

rule: If one gives him ibex oil: The rabisu-spirit will seize him.
interpretation: the rabisuspirit will seize him

rule: If one gives him doe oil: His daughter will die.
interpretation: his daughter will die

rule: If one gives him gazelle oil: His daughter will die.
interpretation: his daughter will die

rule: If one gives him panther oil: He will be happy (lit.: shine).
interpretation: he will be happy lit shine

rule: If one gives him a full goblet: He will have a name and offspring.
omen: one gives him a full goblet
interpretation: he will have a name and offspring

rule: If one gives him wine: A friendly word; his days will be long.
interpretation: a friendly word his days will be long

rule: If one gives him beer: His personal god will remove his heart from him; they will speak to him, but he will forget.
interpretation: his personal god will remove his heart from him they will speak to him but he will forget

rule: If one gives him an unknown kind of beer: He will worry.
omen: one gives him an unknown kind of beer
interpretation: he will worry

rule: If one gives him an infusion of the fruits of the sun-tree: They will claim of him what he has left, evil seizure.
omen: one gives him an infusion of the fruits of the suntree
interpretation: they will claim of him what he has left evil seizure

rule: If one gives him vinegar: He will have brothers.
interpretation: he will have brothers

rule: If one gives him a water-measurer (Hydrometra): His possessions will get lost.
omen: one gives him a watermeasurer hydrometra
interpretation: his possessions will get lost

rule: If one gives him linen: The hand of the god will be placed upon him.
interpretation: the hand of the god will be placed upon him

rule: If one gives him a linen garment: He will stand up against his rival.
omen: one gives him a linen garment
interpretation: he will stand up against his rival

rule: If one gives him an infusion of imhur-esra plants: His possessions will flourish.
omen: one gives him an infusion of imhuresra plants
interpretation: his possessions will flourish

rule: If one gives him meat-broth: Bad health.
interpretation: bad health

rule: If one gives him water: His days will be long.
interpretation: his days will be long

rule: If one gives him beer: They will speak to him, but he will forget.
interpretation: they will speak to him but he will forget

rule: If one gives him wine: His days will be short.
interpretation: his days will be short

rule: If one gives him water from a river: His profit will be large.
omen: one gives him water from a river
interpretation: his profit will be large

rule: If one gives him water from an oil-well: He will experience confusion.
omen: one gives him water from an oilwell
interpretation: he will experience confusion

rule: If one gives him water from a ditch: Quarrels.
omen: one gives him water from a ditch
interpretation: quarrels

rule: If one gives him water from a canal: The Storm-god will flood his harvest.
omen: one gives him water from a canal
interpretation: the stormgod will flood his harvest

rule: If he seizes the hand of an important person: He will gain power or influence.
omen: seizes the hand of an important person
interpretation: he will gain power or influence

rule: If he seizes the garment of an important person: He will achieve importance.
omen: seizes the garment of an important person
interpretation: he will achieve importance

rule: If he seizes the crescent: In an unknown place, a protective angel will be with him, but it will go away.
interpretation: in an unknown place a protective angel will be with him but it will go away

rule: If he seizes the clothing of a small child: A small child will bless him.
omen: seizes the clothing of a small child
interpretation: a small child will bless him

rule: If he seizes a lion: The same as seizing a protective angel.
interpretation: the same as seizing a protective angel

rule: If he seizes a wolf: The same as seizing a protective angel.
interpretation: the same as seizing a protective angel

rule: If he seizes a fox: He will seize or catch a protecting angel.
interpretation: he will seize or catch a protecting angel

rule: If he seizes a fox and it escapes: He will have a protecting angel, but it will go away.
omen: seizes a fox and it escapes
interpretation: he will have a protecting angel but it will go away

rule: If he seizes a ram: The court (lawsuit) will seize him.
interpretation: the court lawsuit will seize him

rule: If he seizes a female dog: He will seize or catch a protective angel, upon the command of the deity.
interpretation: he will seize or catch a protective angel upon the command of the deity

rule: If he seizes a god or a king: The authority of the god or king will catch him.
omen: seizes a god or a king
interpretation: the authority of the god or king will catch him

rule: If a man in his dream chews barley: Accusers will accuse him.
interpretation: accusers will accuse him

rule: If he seizes a snake: He will have a protective angel.
interpretation: he will have a protective angel

rule: If he seizes a he-goat: An evil spirit will seize him.
interpretation: an evil spirit will seize him

rule: If he hears in heaven repeatedly rumors of accusations: He will have worries.
omen: hears in heaven repeatedly rumors of accusations
interpretation: he will have worries

rule: If the god enters the inner part of heaven and is seen: The price of barley will be weighed.
omen: the god enters the inner part of heaven and is seen
interpretation: the price of barley will be weighed

rule: If he descends into the netherworld: He will die but not be buried in the ground; his foundation will not be secure.
interpretation: he will die but not be buried in the ground his foundation will not be secure

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and the dead appear: There will be short days, and in his family there will be cases of death.
omen: descends into the netherworld and the dead appear
interpretation: there will be short days and in his family there will be cases of death

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and the dead curse him: There is blessing for him upon the command of the deity; long days.
omen: descends into the netherworld and the dead curse him
interpretation: there is blessing for him upon the command of the deity long days

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and the dead bless him: He will not be buried in the ground.
omen: descends into the netherworld and the dead bless him
interpretation: he will not be buried in the ground

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and the dead rejoice over him: The rich will become poor, the poor will become rich; he will die but will not be buried where he was born.
omen: descends into the netherworld and the dead rejoice over him
interpretation: the rich will become poor the poor will become rich he will die but will not be buried where he was born

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and sees a dead person: There will be an upsurge in evil.
omen: descends into the netherworld and sees a dead person
interpretation: there will be an upsurge in evil

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and a dead person prostrates before him: He will die but will not lie undisturbed in the ground.
omen: descends into the netherworld and a dead person prostrates before him
interpretation: he will die but will not lie undisturbed in the ground

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and a dead person blesses him: He will die through the collapse of a wall.
omen: descends into the netherworld and a dead person blesses him
interpretation: he will die through the collapse of a wall

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and a dead person kisses him: He will die a death caused by a cold.
omen: descends into the netherworld and a dead person kisses him
interpretation: he will die a death caused by a cold

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and he kisses a dead person: He will die a death caused by a cold.
omen: descends into the netherworld and he kisses a dead person
interpretation: he will die a death caused by a cold

rule: If he descends into the netherworld and he bites a dead person: He will die through a falling roof-beam.
omen: descends into the netherworld and he bites a dead person
interpretation: he will die through a falling roofbeam

rule: If the "spirits" give water to his hands: One of his eyes will be destroyed.
omen: the spirits give water to his hands
interpretation: one of his eyes will be destroyed

rule: If the "spirits" come down from heaven and give water to his hands: They will tear out his eyes, or he will receive the "water of his pupils" for his hands.
omen: the spirits come down from heaven and give water to his hands
interpretation: they will tear out his eyes or he will receive the water of his pupils for his hands

rule: If the "spirits" come down from heaven and give water to the hands of the man: They will tear out his eye, or calumniation will befall the man.
omen: the spirits come down from heaven and give water to the hands of the man
interpretation: they will tear out his eye or calumniation will befall the man

rule: If he hears repeatedly in the sky rumors of accusations: This man will have worries; his possessions will become important.
omen: hears repeatedly in the sky rumors of accusations
interpretation: this man will have worries his possessions will become important

rule: If he cuts the twigs of a date-palm: His misfortune will be removed from him.
omen: cuts the twigs of a datepalm
interpretation: his misfortune will be removed from him

rule: If he cuts down a date-palm: His misfortune will be removed from him.
interpretation: his misfortune will be removed from him

rule: If a basal side-shoot grows out of the date-palm: He will obtain his wish.
omen: a basal sideshoot grows out of the datepalm
interpretation: he will obtain his wish

rule: If a basal side-shoot does not grow out of the date-palm: He will stand up in court against his adversary.
omen: a basal sideshoot does not grow out of the datepalm
interpretation: he will stand up in court against his adversary

rule: If he climbs a date-palm and eats dates: He will worry and suffer repercussions from the palace.
omen: climbs a datepalm and eats dates
interpretation: he will worry and suffer repercussions from the palace

rule: If the SI.KAK of the date-palm is pointed: A destiny of life.
omen: the sikak of the datepalm is pointed
interpretation: a destiny of life

rule: If he cuts down a poplar: Peace of mind.
interpretation: peace of mind

rule: If he cuts down a tamarisk: No peace of mind.
interpretation: no peace of mind

rule: If he cuts down a fir: Peace of mind.
interpretation: peace of mind

rule: If he cuts down a fig-tree: Joy of heart.
interpretation: joy of heart

rule: If he cuts down an apple-tree: He will resolve a legal decision.
interpretation: he will resolve a legal decision

rule: If he cuts down a vine: Joy of heart.
interpretation: joy of heart

rule: If he cuts down a pomegranate-tree: Joy of heart.
interpretation: joy of heart

rule: If he carries a seal-cylinder: He will be seized in prison.
interpretation: he will be seized in prison

rule: If he carries a wagon: He will obtain his heart's desire.
interpretation: he will obtain his hearts desire

rule: If he carries a sabarru-wagon: He will obtain his heart's desire.
interpretation: he will obtain his hearts desire

rule: If he carries a basket of the god: He will be relieved of the evil spell.
omen: carries a basket of the god
interpretation: he will be relieved of the evil spell

rule: If he sits upon a date-palm and carries the image of a god: He will experience turmoil of the heart.
omen: sits upon a datepalm and carries the image of a god
interpretation: he will experience turmoil of the heart

rule: If he carries sariru: He carries an evil spell.
interpretation: he carries an evil spell

rule: If he throws repeatedly the kippu-rope of the kisallitu-woman: He will conduct a lawsuit.
omen: throws repeatedly the kippurope of the kisallituwoman
interpretation: he will conduct a lawsuit

rule: If he plays with a bow: He will conduct a lawsuit.
interpretation: he will conduct a lawsuit

rule: If he nocks the bow: He will conduct a lawsuit.
interpretation: he will conduct a lawsuit

rule: If he repeatedly takes aim with a bow: He will conquer by his own strength.
omen: repeatedly takes aim with a bow
interpretation: he will conquer by his own strength

rule: If he carries a bow and shoots repeatedly: He will have losses by his own fault.
omen: carries a bow and shoots repeatedly
interpretation: he will have losses by his own fault

rule: If he carries a bow and breaks his bow: He will not obtain his heart's desire.
omen: carries a bow and breaks his bow
interpretation: he will not obtain his hearts desire

rule: If he balances a throwing-stick: He will conquer by his own strength.
interpretation: he will conquer by his own strength

rule: If he balances a lariat: He will conquer by his own strength.
interpretation: he will conquer by his own strength

rule: If he carries an arrow: This man will walk safely through the street of his town.
interpretation: this man will walk safely through the street of his town

rule: If he has wings and flies to and fro: His foundation is not solid; for an important person, his good luck will leave him; for a commoner, he is striving for his own misfortune, and his rival will despise him.
omen: has wings and flies to and fro
interpretation: his foundation is not solid for an important person his good luck will leave him for a commoner he is striving for his own misfortune and his rival will despise him

rule: If he has wings and flies to and fro and alights but is not able to take off again: His foundation is not solid; in the positive case, his foundation is solid.
omen: has wings and flies to and fro and alights but is not able to take off again
interpretation: his foundation is not solid in the positive case his foundation is solid

rule: If he takes off and flies once: For an important person, it means good luck; for a commoner, his bad luck will leave him. If he is imprisoned, he will become free; if he is sick, he will recover.
interpretation: for an important person it means good luck for a commoner his bad luck will leave him if he is imprisoned he will become free if he is sick he will recover

rule: If he flies to and fro: His riches will leave the rich, and his bad luck will leave the commoner.
interpretation: his riches will leave the rich and his bad luck will leave the commoner

rule: If he flies but does not reach the limits of heaven and earth: The gods will persecute him with losses, and his rival will despise him.
omen: flies but does not reach the limits of heaven and earth
interpretation: the gods will persecute him with losses and his rival will despise him

rule: If he flies to and fro and disappears but reappears: Sorrow.
omen: flies to and fro and disappears but reappears
interpretation: sorrow

rule: If he flies to and fro and disappears but does not reappear: He will remember hardship.
omen: flies to and fro and disappears but does not reappear
interpretation: he will remember hardship

rule: If he flies to and fro and his hands are weakened: His foundation is not solid.
omen: flies to and fro and his hands are weakened
interpretation: his foundation is not solid

rule: If he falls into a river and the river enters his mouth: He will become important.
omen: falls into a river and the river enters his mouth
interpretation: he will become important

rule: If he sinks into a river and emerges again: This man will have riches.
omen: sinks into a river and emerges again
interpretation: this man will have riches

rule: If he seizes a fish in the river: He will obtain his heart's desire.
omen: seizes a fish in the river
interpretation: he will obtain his hearts desire

rule: If he brings up clay from the river: He will build a house.
omen: brings up clay from the river
interpretation: he will build a house

rule: If he eats in a river the rushes: They will burn him.
omen: eats in a river the rushes
interpretation: they will burn him

rule: If he dips into a river: His sorrows will not reach him.
interpretation: his sorrows will not reach him

rule: If he dips repeatedly into a river and reaches firm ground: Calumniation.
omen: dips repeatedly into a river and reaches firm ground
interpretation: calumniation

rule: If he falls into a river: Sickness will seize him.
interpretation: sickness will seize him

rule: If he walks constantly in dark waters: He will face a difficult lawsuit and be summoned to testify.
interpretation: he will face a difficult lawsuit and be summoned to testify

rule: If he washes himself in a river: He will experience losses.
interpretation: he will experience losses

rule: If he sinks into a river and comes up again: He will have worries.
omen: sinks into a river and comes up again
interpretation: he will have worries

rule: If he crosses a river: He will experience confusion.
interpretation: he will experience confusion

rule: If he goes down to the river and comes up again: He will stand up in court against his adversary.
omen: goes down to the river and comes up again
interpretation: he will stand up in court against his adversary

rule: If he comes up from the river: Good news.
interpretation: good news

rule: If he washes himself in the river and then comes up: He will experience losses in business.
omen: washes himself in the river and then comes up
interpretation: he will experience losses in business

rule: If he dams up the river: He will see hard times.
interpretation: he will see hard times

rule: If he falls into a river and drifts downstream: He will ask something from a person friendly to him, but he will not receive it.
omen: falls into a river and drifts downstream
interpretation: he will ask something from a person friendly to him but he will not receive it

rule: If he sinks into a river in his clothes: The foundation of this man is solid.
omen: sinks into a river in his clothes
interpretation: the foundation of this man is solid

rule: If he falls into a river and drifts upstream: He will ask something from a person not friendly to him, and he will receive it.
omen: falls into a river and drifts upstream
interpretation: he will ask something from a person not friendly to him and he will receive it

rule: If he carries a grown-up person: He will encounter full wrath.
interpretation: he will encounter full wrath

rule: If he carries a child: He will encounter full wrath.
interpretation: he will encounter full wrath

rule: If he carries the crescent symbol: He will encounter full wrath.
interpretation: he will encounter full wrath

rule: If he carries the sun-disk symbol: He will encounter full wrath.
interpretation: he will encounter full wrath

rule: If he carries the divine scepter: He will experience losses.
interpretation: he will experience losses

rule: If he carries dates on his head: Sorrow.
interpretation: sorrow

rule: If he carries a mountain on his head: He will have no rival.
omen: carries a mountain on his head
interpretation: he will have no rival

rule: If he carries salt on his head: The builder of his house will be led in shame around the town.
interpretation: the builder of his house will be led in shame around the town

rule: If he carries saltpetre from the foundation walls of his house: He will be buried in the town.
omen: carries saltpetre from the foundation walls of his house
interpretation: he will be buried in the town

rule: If he carries salt: His teeth will hurt him.
interpretation: his teeth will hurt him

rule: If he carries meat in the street: His health will not be good.
interpretation: his health will not be good

rule: If he carries barley in the street: He will stand up in court against his adversary.
interpretation: he will stand up in court against his adversary

rule: If he carries beer in the street: Peace of mind.
interpretation: peace of mind

rule: If he carries beer-wort in the street: To grieve is in store for him.
interpretation: to grieve is in store for him

rule: If he carries water in the street: His misfortune will depart.
interpretation: his misfortune will depart

rule: If he carries a table in the street: He will die through the wrath caused by his own words.
omen: carries a table in the street
interpretation: he will die through the wrath caused by his own words

rule: If the god utters a benediction before the man: He will experience the wrath of the god.
omen: the god utters a benediction before the man
interpretation: he will experience the wrath of the god

rule: If the god utters a curse against the man: His prayers will be accepted.
omen: the god utters a curse against the man
interpretation: his prayers will be accepted
